forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 51. South southwest wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 5 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the city awakens under a serene blanket of partial cloud cover. The temperature lingers comfortably in the low fifties, with a gentle breeze whispering from the southwest, offering a cool embrace. Conditions are peacefully mild, steering clear of the disquiet often ushered in by a dense marine layer. Though hints of fog may flirt at the peripheries, the overall atmosphere appears clear and inviting, promising a sunny day ahead. As the sun rises higher, temperatures will gradually warm, reaching a mild sixties before settling into a contemplative chill by afternoon.

With the forecasted breeze, it is wise to don layers—perhaps a lightweight jacket over a casual shirt to navigate the subtle shifts in temperature. As the day unfolds, the sunshine invites leisurely strolls along the waterfront or perhaps a quiet visit to one of the local cafés. Consider spending time at an outdoor seating area to savor a warm beverage, allowing the warmth of the sun to intermingle with the crisp air. This is a day for quiet contemplation or casual gatherings, perfect for soaking in the allure of the city while the fog holds its distance.
